transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji namaste sir, good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon.
Customer: Sir ye keh rahe hai aapka jo app open nahi ho raha hai to aap usko ek bari uninstall karke install kiya hai aapne check kiya hai?
Customer: Haan ji maine kal kiya tha.
Executive: To abhi bhi nahi hua?
Customer: Nahi ho raha hai na.
Executive: Kya aap ye apna jo aapka ye primary number jo seven ye last me four double one hai seven eight se starting hai usi se login kar rahe hai?
Customer: Bilkul usi se kar raha hu.
Executive: Jaise isko login kar rahe hai to aapko ye same immediate likh ke aa ja raha hai web page not available.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir ye inka concern ye hai na ki matlab ye jab bhi apne primary number se login kar rahe hai kal jabki inhone apna app uninstall karke install bhi kiya hai still unka yahi show kar raha hai.
Executive: Verma ji hello.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir ek kaam ek kaam karenge thoda sa ye wala jo mobile aapka hai koi dusra ghar me wife matlab kisi ka bhi ho bhai ka.
Customer: Haan maine dusre se dusre se kiya uske baad maine kya kiya ki waha se message dala search karke message dala chunri ka to mere paas message aaya jab maine usko open kiya na to fir application open ho raha hai mai ye janna chah raha hu usme.
Customer: Haan usme application open ho raha hai.
Executive: To sir isme na jaise suno jaise display us pe aa rahi hai na same hi mere pe aa rahi hai.
Customer: Magar hum mere pe aati thi na ki lead by matlab ke kitna hai kaun si kaun si state se kar rahe ho kya hai aisa kuch bhi nahi aa raha hai meri display pe.
Executive: Matlab suniye sir jo aapke me problem aa rahi hai aap yahi kehna chah rahe ho dusre mobile me jab humne application download ki hai usme bhi same dikkat aa rahi hai aap yahi kehna chah rahe hai.
Customer: Ji haan same dikkat aa rahi hai jaise open karte hai waha pe bhi yahi aa raha hai ki ye close hai.
Executive: Ye close hai?
Customer: Haan matlab ke jaise maine screenshot leke uske likha hua hai na same cheez aa rahi hai.
Executive: Whatsapp calling karu?
Executive: Ek minute ruk jao sir mai aapko na whatsapp calling karta hu thik hai.
Customer: To thik hai kya.
Executive: Haan external ka hai thik hai okay.
Executive: Accha photo aapne bheja hua hai thik hai ek minute.

Executive: Ye le lijiye.

Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Thik hai sir ji.

Executive: Idhar aapke person ka naam kya hai?
Customer: Hmm hmm.

Executive: Four one one hai na sir ka.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir mai call kar raha hu aapko na whatsapp calling kar raha hu video call thik hai.
Customer: Bilkul thik hai.
Executive: Whatsapp video call kar raha hu fir mai aapko batata hu kaise kaise hai aap mere ko batana thik hai mai call karta hu aapko okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- App not opening on primary number.

- Same issue on another mobile.

- Display not showing lead details.



Resolution:

- Executive will do a WhatsApp video call.

- Executive will guide the customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- app issue, login, display, whatsapp call
